mention.text: the country , Christian Mihr , German Reporters
Italian photojournalist Andrea Rocchelli and his Russian fixer and interpreter
the first media workers to be killed in Ukraine since the beginning of the conflict
Le Monde , L Espresso and Foreign Policy
the conflict to respect the work of journalists , regardless of the editorial policies of their news organizations
Journalists of Russian news portal LifeNews
